```{r}
#load ggplot2 and other example data set 
library(tidyverse)
# load the data 
starwars_copy<- starwars
#some of the data type we can see
head(starwars_copy)
class(starwars_copy$name)
class(starwars_copy$height)
ggplot(data=starwars_copy, mapping = aes(x=height,y=mass) )+
 geom_point()

```
